description: Licences for over-75s on the Isle of Man will continue to be free "until the end of 2020", the BBC confirms.
title: TV licences free for over-75s on Isle of Man until 2021
title_page: TV licences free for over-75s on Isle of Man until 2021 - BBC News
maintext: "A short-term licence running to the end of December 2020 will be automatically issued in due course. Island residents who turn 75 from the end of July can also apply for a free TV licence that will run until the end of the year.
